main_definition: The abbreviation 'www' stands for the word 'World Wide Web', a system of interconnected hypertext documents accessed via the internet.

meanings_and_examples.example: I visited www.google.com to search for information.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A domain name extension commonly used for websites
An informal phrase implying the presence of irrelevant content or gossip
meanings_and_examples.example: I don't want to hear any more 'www' about your personal life.
